title: Linear Regression Tutorial
text:
Purpose
Linear regression is an essential tool for any statistician, data scientist, or machine learning practitioner. Linear regression is used to model the relationship between a dependent variable and one or more independent variables. Linear regression can be used:
- to make future predictions 
- understand the strength of relationships between variables
- identify trends in data. 
This tutorial will cover the basics of linear regression using Python. To demonstrate, a database containing pricing and size (in square feet) of houses in California will be used. The goal of this tutorial is to predict the price of a house based on its size. ```

### Import necessary libraries

::: {#2d0767c1 .cell execution_count=1}
``` {.python .cell-code}
import pandas as pd
from sklearn.datasets import fetch_california_housing
:::
The libraries being used are pandas and sklearn. Pandas is a useful library for data modeling and analysis. sklearn contains the dataset we will be using for this tutorial.

title: About Me
text:
Brody Duncan

Introduction
I am a university student studying data science. I’m interested in how data, policy, and real‑world decision‑making intersect. I am especially interested in legal analytics, a cross-section between statistics and the legal industry. I plan to attend law school after completing my undergraduate degree.


Education

Brigham Young University
B.S in Statistics; empahasis in data science
Expected graduation: April 2027



Experience

Freshman Mentor for the Office of First Year Experience at BYU

Guide current university freshman their first year and help them understand available resources

Past positions:

Catering staff for BYU dining services
Assistant supervisor of merchandise at SeaWorld, San Antonio

Volunteer service at a local community food bank



Skills

Proficient in R for data analysis, wrangling, and modeling
Trained in Python for various basic tasks
Working proficiency in Spanish
Certified in various Microsoft programs (Excel, PowerPoint, Word)
Certified in Adobe Photoshop and Illustrator
Strong team player and leader from various job and extracurricular positions



Get to Know Me
I come from quite a large family, as I grew up with 5 brothers. All of my free time growing up was spent around my family finding whatever we could to entertain ourselves.
I really enjoy playing strategy games, especially board games. I am currently engaged and going to get married this June.


Headshot



Headshot of Brody Duncan

title: Welcome to My Data Science Portfolio
text:
Welcome to my data science portfolio! This site shows my journey learning data science and analytics. Here you’ll find projects that demonstrate what I’ve learned and discovered.

I built this site using Quarto and host it on GitHub Pages.
